content.text: Stealth Black is a fictional member of Germa 66 portrayed in the comic strip Sora, Warrior of the Sea. His character was likely based on a Raid Suit created by the Vinsmoke Family that was later given to their estranged third son, Sanji.

According to Trafalgar Law, Sanji in his Raid Suit heavily resembles Stealth Black. Thus, Stealth Black likely wears a presumably black Germa outfit with a cape that has the number 3 on it, as well as a mask over his nose and mouth and an ascot around his neck. His hair is also slicked into two parts at the front, one pointing up and the other pointing down.

images.caption: Sanji in his Raid Suit, which apparently heavily resembles Stealth Black.

content.text: Given that he is a member of the villainous Germa 66 in the comic strip, Stealth Black participates in their antagonism to the hero Sora.
Stealth Black possesses the ability to blend in with his environment so well that he effectively becomes invisible, much like the wearer of the Raid Suit he was based on.
In the comic strip Sora, Warrior of the Sea, Stealth Black worked with other members of the Germa 66 as antagonists who fought against the protagonist, Sora.

elements.text: Due to Sanji's dislike for his heritage, he referred to himself in his outfit as "O-Soba Mask" when fighting Page One instead of "Stealth Black".
↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 92 Chapter 931, Law reveals the existence of Stealth Black in the Sora comic strip.
